## Registry interface

Implemented by objects that which to register dependencies in a container.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Registry 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [register(container, params)](./fast-foundation.registry.register.md) | Registers dependencies in the specified container. |
